extension.dc:title: GGBN Preparation Extension
extension.name: Preparation
extension.dc:description: Support for preparation properties as an extension to an Material Sample core. Intended to be a one to many relation to the Material Sample core.

property.name: preparationType
property.dc:description: Description of preparation type (specimens, tissues, DNA)
property.examples: for DNA: gDNA; for tissues/specimens: leaf, muscle, leg, blood

property.name: preparationProcess
property.dc:description: Process used in preparing the specimen or sample, can also be used to describe Phage/Plasmid propagation, Process used in extracting the DNA/RNA; adaptions made; SPREC code

property.name: preparationMaterials
property.dc:description: Materials and chemicals used in the preparation of the specimen, tissue, DNA or RNA sample
property.examples: for DNA: DNeasy blood and tissue kit, CTAB;

property.name: preparedBy
property.dc:description: Person and/or institution responsible for or effecting the preparation/extraction

property.name: associatedReferences
property.dc:description: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the Preparation.
